title: Dark Storm
actors: Stephen Baldwin, Rob LaBelle, Gardiner Millar
details: Dark Storm is a movie where a group of scientists, led by Dr. Gray, races against time and greedy weapons dealers to prevent a discovery related to Dark Matter from destroying the world. The plot involves a scientist who gains the ability to control the weather after an experimental weapon malfunctions.

title: Whisper of Fate
details: Whispers of Fate is a narrative set in war-torn Faery, revolving around themes of betrayal and hope as old acquaintances come together, facing new challenges. It is also the title of the first album in a music series by John Koulalis, which is inspired by fantasy worlds and dreamy soundscapes.

title: Grim Reckoning
details: The Reckoning is a horror drama set in the 17th Century that explores themes of misogyny and witch trials. The storyline revolves around a young widow named Grace, who, following the suicide of her husband, is falsely accused of witchcraft by her landlord after she spurns his advances. While the film is noted for its visual elements, it has received mixed reviews regarding its thematic depth and execution.

title: Timeless Myth
details: Article 370 is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language political action thriller film directed by Aditya Suhas Jambhale. The story follows special agent Zooni Haksar, who is assigned a covert mission to curb violence in a conflict-ridden area ahead of a significant constitutional decision.

title: Veil of Night
details: The movie Crew is an enjoyable heist comedy that combines humor with engaging plots and witty dialogues. It features unexpected twists, although some moments miss the mark for greater comedic impact. Overall, it succeeds in entertaining its audience, despite a few missed opportunities.

title: Me Time
details: Me Time is a 2022 American buddy comedy film written and directed by John Hamburg. The movie stars Kevin Hart and Mark Wahlberg and follows a devoted stay-at-home dad who finally gets some time to himself for the first time in years. He reconnects with an old friend for a wild birthday adventure while his wife and kids are away.
